examples.example: 看，那盘金橘在阳光下闪耀着诱人的光芒，让人心情愉悦。

translate.english: Look, that plate of kumquats is shining with an alluring light in the sunlight, making people feel happy.

examples.example: 妈妈买了一些金橘回来，满屋子都充满了清新的果香。

translate.english: Mother bought some kumquats back and the whole room was filled with fresh fruity fragrance.

examples.example: 过年的时候，家里总会准备一盘金橘，寓意着吉祥如意。

translate.english: During the Spring Festival, there will always be a plate of kumquats prepared at home, symbolizing good luck and prosperity.
